12/*! \file */
13
14#ifndef IRS_NETDB_H
15#define IRS_NETDB_H 1
16
17#include <stddef.h> /* Required on FreeBSD (and others?) for size_t. */
18#include <netdb.h> /* Contractual provision. */
19
20/*
21 * Undefine all #defines we are interested in as <netdb.h> may or may not have
22 * defined them.
23 */
24
25/*
26 * Error return codes from gethostbyname() and gethostbyaddr()
27 * (left in extern int h_errno).
28 */
29
30#undef NETDB_INTERNAL
31#undef NETDB_SUCCESS
32#undef HOST_NOT_FOUND
33#undef TRY_AGAIN
34#undef NO_RECOVERY
35#undef NO_DATA
36#undef NO_ADDRESS
37
38#define NETDB_INTERNAL -1 /* see errno */
39#define NETDB_SUCCESS 0 /* no problem */
40#define HOST_NOT_FOUND 1 /* Authoritative Answer Host not found */
41#define TRY_AGAIN 2 /* Non-Authoritive Host not found, or SERVERFAIL */
42#define NO_RECOVERY 3 /* Non recoverable errors, FORMERR, REFUSED, NOTIMP */
43#define NO_DATA 4 /* Valid name, no data record of requested type */
44#define NO_ADDRESS NO_DATA /* no address, look for MX record */
45
46/*
47 * Error return codes from getaddrinfo(). EAI_INSECUREDATA is our own extension
48 * and it's very unlikely to be already defined, but undef it just in case; it
49 * at least doesn't do any harm.
50 */
51
52#undef EAI_ADDRFAMILY
53#undef EAI_AGAIN
54#undef EAI_BADFLAGS
55#undef EAI_FAIL
56#undef EAI_FAMILY
57#undef EAI_MEMORY
58#undef EAI_NODATA
59#undef EAI_NONAME
60#undef EAI_SERVICE
61#undef EAI_SOCKTYPE
62#undef EAI_SYSTEM
63#undef EAI_BADHINTS
64#undef EAI_PROTOCOL
65#undef EAI_OVERFLOW
66#undef EAI_INSECUREDATA
67#undef EAI_MAX
68
69#define EAI_ADDRFAMILY 1 /* address family for hostname not supported */
70#define EAI_AGAIN 2 /* temporary failure in name resolution */
71#define EAI_BADFLAGS 3 /* invalid value for ai_flags */
72#define EAI_FAIL 4 /* non-recoverable failure in name resolution */
73#define EAI_FAMILY 5 /* ai_family not supported */
74#define EAI_MEMORY 6 /* memory allocation failure */
75#define EAI_NODATA 7 /* no address associated with hostname */
76#define EAI_NONAME 8 /* hostname nor servname provided, or not known */
77#define EAI_SERVICE 9 /* servname not supported for ai_socktype */
78#define EAI_SOCKTYPE 10 /* ai_socktype not supported */
79#define EAI_SYSTEM 11 /* system error returned in errno */
80#define EAI_BADHINTS 12
81#define EAI_PROTOCOL 13
82#define EAI_OVERFLOW 14
83#define EAI_INSECUREDATA 15
84#define EAI_MAX 16
85
86/*
87 * Flag values for getaddrinfo()
88 */
89#undef AI_PASSIVE
90#undef AI_CANONNAME
91#undef AI_NUMERICHOST
92
93#define AI_PASSIVE 0x00000001
94#define AI_CANONNAME 0x00000002
95#define AI_NUMERICHOST 0x00000004
96
97/*
98 * Flag values for getipnodebyname()
99 */
100#undef AI_V4MAPPED
101#undef AI_ALL
102#undef AI_ADDRCONFIG
103#undef AI_DEFAULT
104
105#define AI_V4MAPPED 0x00000008
106#define AI_ALL 0x00000010
107#define AI_ADDRCONFIG 0x00000020
108#define AI_DEFAULT (AI_V4MAPPED|AI_ADDRCONFIG)
109
110/*
111 * Constants for getnameinfo()
112 */
113#undef NI_MAXHOST
114#undef NI_MAXSERV
115
116#define NI_MAXHOST 1025
117#define NI_MAXSERV 32
118
119/*
120 * Flag values for getnameinfo()
121 */
122#undef NI_NOFQDN
123#undef NI_NUMERICHOST
124#undef NI_NAMEREQD
125#undef NI_NUMERICSERV
126#undef NI_DGRAM
127#undef NI_NUMERICSCOPE
128
129#define NI_NOFQDN 0x00000001
130#define NI_NUMERICHOST 0x00000002
131#define NI_NAMEREQD 0x00000004
132#define NI_NUMERICSERV 0x00000008
133#define NI_DGRAM 0x00000010
134
135/*
136 * Define to map into irs_ namespace.
137 */
138#ifndef __NetBSD__
139#define IRS_NAMESPACE
140#endif
141
142#ifdef IRS_NAMESPACE
143
144/*
145 * Use our versions not the ones from the C library.
146 */
147
148#ifdef getnameinfo
149#undef getnameinfo
150#endif
151#define getnameinfo irs_getnameinfo
152
153#ifdef getaddrinfo
154#undef getaddrinfo
155#endif
156#define getaddrinfo irs_getaddrinfo
157
158#ifdef freeaddrinfo
159#undef freeaddrinfo
160#endif
161#define freeaddrinfo irs_freeaddrinfo
162
163#ifdef gai_strerror
164#undef gai_strerror
165#endif
166#define gai_strerror irs_gai_strerror
167
168int
169getaddrinfo(const char *hostname, const char *servname,
170 const struct addrinfo *hints, struct addrinfo **res);
171
172int
173getnameinfo(const struct sockaddr *sa, socklen_t salen,
174 char *host, socklen_t hostlen,
175 char *serv, socklen_t servlen,
176 int flags);
177
178void freeaddrinfo (struct addrinfo *ai);
179
180const char *
181gai_strerror(int ecode);
182
183#endif /* IRS_NAMESPACE */
184
185/*
186 * Tell Emacs to use C mode on this file.
187 * Local variables:
188 * mode: c
189 * End:
190 */
191
192#endif /* IRS_NETDB_H */
193
